about_the_game:
For a whole decade, the whereabouts of an abandoned underground mining facility has remained a mystery... until now. You had a lead, to investigate a specific mountain range in Arizona. The fate of the expedition is up to your skills as an explorer, and the trials of the caverns below.

Feel the Immersion

From the outside air of Arizonas' mountain ranges, to the claustraphobic cave walls.

Unique Mechanics

Each chapter introduces a new terrifying challenge. Such as sneaking around cave labyrinths, using camera systems, or time sensitive tasks.

Lore and World Building

The deeper you go, the more secrets get unturned...

content_descriptors.notes: Use of psychological horror and jump scares

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
